Posts.Content: So sorry to hear this. That is a big concern of mine. Both Arimidex and Femera effect bone density. Time for more meds. Good Luck, P
Posts.Title: Osteoporosis diagnosis

Posts.Content: We never know when it is going to hit us, but eventually it does. It finally slaps us in our faces that we have cancer and this is some serious shtuff. I glad your team is good to you and helps you through it. You make sure you come to the boards when you need to unload. We are here for each other. P
Posts.Title: Got marked for radiation yesterday

Posts.Content: Although it may be hard to see, I am holding both of your hands and I will pray that things go well for the two of you. I will pray for both of you tonight. P
Posts.Title: Here I am again

Posts.Content: So sorry to hear your news.....we will pray for both you and your mom.
Posts.Title: my mom is having a triple biopsy on Tuesday

Posts.Content: Good luck with your surgery Wednesday. I'll be praying for you. P
Posts.Title: surgery next wednesday

Posts.Content: Ditto. Love P
Posts.Title: *******THANK YOU CATS TOY!*******

Posts.Content: I am sorry to hear that you lost your dog but glad to hear you got a new puppy. Pets are a great comfort during our illness. Take care. P
Posts.Title: Good Morning

Posts.Content: So sorry to hear about your recurrence. No one knows why cancer returns with or without chemo; with or without masectomy. Sometimes you do everything right and the outcome is different than planned. I can only pray for you and wish you all the best. P
Posts.Title: BC reoccurence

Posts.Content: Big prayers coming up. Prayers for your friend and prayers to give you strenght. Take care, P
Posts.Title: Benefit for a friend, need prayers

Posts.Content: Keep fighting, Lady. I know that you are tired and it may be easier said than done, but keep up the good fight. I am sure you will beat this. Keep us posted and let me know if I can help in any way....even if it is just to listen. P
Posts.Title: Update on my reoccurence

Posts.Content: You have a right to unload. You have a lot going on and a lot of it not fun and kind of scary. I wish you well. Remember we are here for you. Let us know how things go. P

Posts.Content: No advice.....only prayers. So sorry to hear the news. I hope the treatment works for you.

Posts.Content: Glad to hear it. I am so glad you are well on your way to recovery. Take care of yourself. P
Posts.Title: Glad to meet you, NED

Posts.Content: My B-Day is March 27. It's coming up. P
Posts.Title: When is your Birthday?

Posts.Content: My B-Day is March 27. It's coming up. P
Posts.Title: When is your Birthday?

Posts.Content: Happy birthday, Rainbow. I hope your wishes all come true when you blow out the candles on your ice cream. P
Posts.Title: Today is Rainbow4's Birthday!

Posts.Content: Keep the jokes coming. It feels good to laugh. P
Posts.Title: Back at the Ranch...

Posts.Content: I have had one or the other since treatment started in July, however, I attributed it to the chemo drugs and the iron tablets I had to take to get my red blood cells up. Take care. P
Posts.Title: Rads question

Posts.Content: I will be praying that your surgery is a successful one. Sorry I can't take some of the pain from you. Take care of yourself. P
Posts.Title: Update BJmom

Posts.Content: You have a right to refuse chemo if you wish. My onc has told me he has been told by a few women that they do not want to go through chemo. Just weigh everything out before you make a decision. I chose to fight with everything I have and with all the modern medicine known to man. But that is part of my nature. Keep in mind, there are agencies that can help you pay the bills. Your hair will grow back and there are medicines to reduce the side effects. We are also here to get you through it. P
Posts.Title: Has anyone out there refused chemo?

Posts.Content: Welcome back to the site. Glad you are feeling better. You know, this website has a list of questions you can print out to take with you to ask the Doc. You can even tape record the conversation if you want. My Doc let me record it. Keep us posted. P
Posts.Title: treatments starting soon

Posts.Content: Happy birthday, Cheryl. I hope your day is a special one. How are you Cat? Are you feeling alright? Still making our B-Days special ones. I love ya for doing that. P
Posts.Title: Today is Cheryl4's Birthday!

Posts.Content: T.....please step away from the reports!!! If we were meant to interpret our reports then we would all being doing it and our medical bills would be greatly reduced. Let the experts review and discuss before reacting. I know, you are saying, "That is easy for her to say." But let's not react until we know what we are reacting to. And when we get the news, we will help you deal with whatever that is. We are all here for you. I am only 30 minutes from you. Do not hesitate to call me, yell, scream, kick and then cry on my shoulder. Whatever you need, we, I am here.

Posts.Content: Sorry things are not going well for you. I am glad to hear that things are back on track. Hang in there, we are all here for you. P
Posts.Title: Delay yet again...

Posts.Content: Glad to hear that you are alright and I hope your daughter is on the road to recovery.
Posts.Title: Meena .. How are you doing, our PINK WARRIOR .. We are thinking about you

Posts.Content: Prayers for you, coming up. Try to relax so you don't make yourself sick. Additional prayers coming up for that. P
Posts.Title: Say a prayer for me please...

Posts.Content: Traci, That is so awesome. I am so happy for you. Enjoy yourself and have fun. P
Posts.Title: Hands off, girls -- NED is all mine today!

Posts.Content: Welcome to this site. You are amongst friends and in good company. Chemo is tough and it will wipe you out because your red and white blood cells are low. Take it easy and get plenty of rest. Take care of yourself and if you are feeling depressed, come on to the boards and talk about it and do contact your Onc. P
Posts.Title: New to discussions and have questions

Posts.Content: Hello. Glad you are doing this. My right arm is a bit swollen but not anything major. Just have to do exercises and watch it. Keep us posted. P
